channel.title: Posts on My online shed
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My online shed

item.title: Part2
item.description: Part 2?? Where is part 1? It has been a while (more than 5 years) since my last post. I have been inspired by this post to write. I can relate to almost all of the learnings that Justin Etheredge lists out - apart from one glaring omission - writing. From now on, I aim to write as often as possible - most will be tech related.

item.title: welcome
item.description: A new beginning with Hugo This site hangs together with : Hugo Github Pages Cloudflare In a future post, I will explain in detail how they link up.
